name: Shape Quiz
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2308240

Welcome to Shape Quiz - Unleash Your Inner Detective!


Embark on a captivating visual adventure where shapes take the spotlight. Can you discern the shapes hidden within intriguing outlines? Put your perception and speed to the test in this exhilarating quiz game!

🌟 Shape Exploration:

Delve into the world of shapes as they gradually unfold on your screen. Can you identify them all correctly?

🌟 Race Against Time:

Quick thinking is key! Identify the correct shape swiftly to earn stars and dominate the global leaderboard.

🌟 Daily Challenge:

Challenge yourself daily with a unique set of 10 shape-based puzzles. Can you outperform others who are shown the exact same shapes?

🌟 Diamonds:

Earn diamonds as rewards! Get 5 diamonds for every 5 correct answers in standard mode. In Daily Challenge mode, receive a diamond for each correct answer.

🌟 Game Over:

In the event of an incorrect answer, the round gracefully concludes, affording you the chance to restart and redeem yourself.

🌟 Information & Settings:

Access game instructions and the development version in this section.

Shape Quiz is your opportunity to prove your shape recognition skills. Rise through the ranks and become a star collector. Get ready to embark on this visual journey today!
